product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Getaway Chair - Special Buy
long_description: Lightweight and collapsible, the ALPS Mountaineering Getaway Chair is perfect for tailgating, beach trips or car camping adventures. Durable powder-coated steel frame; airy nylon mesh seat fabric offers breathable comfort. Polyester cooler pocket on the left arm keeps beverages cold and within easy reach. Includes a 32 x 5 in. carry bag with backpack straps for easy transport. Special buy.
short_description: Lightweight and collapsible, the ALPS Mountaineering Getaway Chair is perfect for tailgating, beach trips or car camping adventures.
